scripts.lint: echo lint-versions lint-ts lint-prettier | parallel --delimiter ' ' --trim npm run --silent {}
scripts.lint-watch: chokidar '**/*.ts' --ignore node_modules --debounce 100 --initial --command 'echo -n Linting...\ && npm run --silent lint && echo OK'
scripts.watch: echo client-js-watch client-css-watch server-watch | parallel --delimiter ' ' --trim npm run {}
scripts.client-build: npm run client-js-build && npm run client-css-build
scripts.client-js-watch: NODE_PATH=src watchify src/lightening/client/index.ts -p [ tsify --project src/lightening/client ] -v -o src/lightening/client/index.js
scripts.client-js-build: NODE_PATH=src browserify src/lightening/client/index.ts -p [ tsify --project src/lightening/client ] > src/lightening/client/index.js
scripts.server-watch: check-node-version --package && NODE_PATH=src nodemon --watch src/lightening/server --watch src/lightening/shared --ext ts --exec ts-node -- --project src/lightening/server/tsconfig.json src/lightening/server
